segments.text: I can't believe how unaware the woman seems of the mess she's created.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she just keeps polishing that plate as if in a trance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not see the puddle growing at her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And there are her children, oh boy, what are they up to?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy looks like he might topple over any second, reaching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a wave of frustration for the risks they’re taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is practically glowing with anticipation; she wants one so badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost sweet to witness her eagerness, and yet I feel a pang of disgust at the secrecy of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s something wrong with this picture, and it’s unsettling to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Will anyone notice? Will this end in disaster? I can only hope it doesn’t.
segments.speaker: PAR
